content: Enjoy the fun of SCUBA without the hassle of bulky equipment by going in the water with this hybrid SCUBA/snorkel system. It’s designed to function like a snorkel with a long hose so that you can safely dive to depths of 5 meters without using tanks.

Play your favorite PC titles on the go using this portable console for PC games. Though it’s only around half an inch thick, it boasts a powerful quad-core processor and can switch between Windows 10 and Android 6 so that you can also use it as a phone.

Keep your room organized without sacrificing precious space using this modular shelving system. After installing the plywood rails, you can easily slide a number of attachments like shelves, hooks, boxes, and cups depending on your storage needs.

Make any wall in your home or office LEGO compatible in mere seconds using these LEGO wall tiles. Each 10 x 10 inch tile comes with a special reusable adhesive backing you can easily stick onto any flat surface to create a vertical LEGO playing space.

This rugged solar powered speaker is the ideal way to listen to your favorite tunes while you’re out in nature. The speaker offers superb audio quality and comes in a rugged, shockproof, waterproof, and dust-proof exterior that’ll stand up to any weather conditions.

Make your collection of sci-fi collectibles stand out from the rest with one of these unique customizable lightsabers. Each sword features a sturdy aircraft grade hilt that can be fully customized and comes with an LED blade that you can set to one of twenty colors.

Have your choice of hot or cold when thirst strikes by toting around this modular temperature bottle. The design of this unique bottle allows you to store 2 beverages of opposing temperatures at the same time with perfect insulation.

Relive gaming’s golden age by playing all your favorite titles from the comfort of home using this universal vintage gaming console. It comes pre-loaded with over 100 classic titles like Pac-Man and Super Mario, and is compatible with a variety of classic console controllers.

Armed with the cardboard drum kit you’ll be able to set up a spontaneous jam session almost anywhere. It’s lightweight, easy to carry, and sets up in mere minutes to accommodate both right handed and left handed drummers.

Remain cool on warm summer days – even if you have to wear pants – by putting on a pair of the ultimate hot weather pants.  They’re made from a proprietary fabric designed to absorb moisture away from the skin and into the fabric fibers so you always stay cool.

Instantly liven up any dull night by getting everyone to play this Truth Or Dare Russian Roulette styled card game. The game works by having players draw a card and then state what the odds are that they’ll do the dare stated on the card.

Become an expert on your favorite classic consoles by flipping through the pages of the NES Visual Compendium. A series of vibrant images, fan art, mini articles, and much more take you on a visual tour of the old school NES and Famicom consoles.

These totally rad art print sound systems provide crisp 21st century sound with some 1980s flair. This Bluetooth enabled sound system delivers amazing audio that plays through the speakers mounted in the frame to give the illusion the print has come to life.

Transform your plain belt into a utility belt that would make Batman proud using this multi-tool belt buckle. Though small in size, this handy accessory comes with over six useful tools including a hexbit, box wrench, and multiple screwdrivers.

Marvel at the beauty of the universe while you jam out by listening to your tunes out of this constellation clock speaker. The speaker offers an up close view of the northern hemisphere’s constellations while providing lovely ambient lighting.

Enjoy an extremely satisfying coffee house quality cup from the comfort of home using this freshness sensing coffee grinder. It features a compact design that you can easily transport and comes with a range of settings that let you fine-tune your grind.

Transition seamlessly from dinner time to game time by placing this convertible board game/dining table in your home. The elegant wooden surface lifts off to reveal an ample 5′ x 3′ playing surface complete with arm rests and cup holders.

Teach your child the basics of programming from an early age with the Photon robot. Apart from teaching your kid using a simple color based language, he is designed to grow with the child – allowing for more complex challenges and interactions as time passes.

Transform your plain smartphone into a digital microscope using these macro and micro smartphone lenses. These ultra thin lenses go over your smartphone’s camera to enhance its optical power so you can explore the world around you.

Prevent germs and bacteria from taking over your comfy bed by sleeping on top of these antibacterial silver fiber sheets. These 300 thread-count sheets are made with innovative silver fibers that prevent the growth of unwanted bacteria and will never wash away.

Re-imagine the way you relax by resting your tired bones on this smart adjustable furniture. With a design inspired by the human spine, this versatile piece is composed of 1260 small segments of wood you can bend and mold into a number of comfortable positions.

Change the way you view your day by swapping out your old timepiece for this 24 hour wall clock. It sports a vibrant color scheme to symbolize dawn, noon, and dusk, and moves quietly at half the speed of a regular clock – making one full rotation every 24 hours.

Transform your style in seconds without spending a bundle when you wear the Omnia convertible dress. The unique design of this stylish garment lets you wear it in one of over a hundred different styles – making it the perfect outfit for any occasion.

Perfect your posture while strengthening your core using this spine gym machine. Simply place yourself in between the poles and perform a range of motions with your torso to effectively work out everything from your lower back to your obliques and abdominals.

Take your favorite games with you wherever you go using this tabletop game transporting bag. The bag includes an array of specialized pockets, cases, and accessories that make transporting board games, dice games, and card games a breeze.

Keep your home cool without burdening the planet using this eco-friendly ice cube air conditioner. It features an internal fan and re-freezable ice pack that sucks in hot air and expels cool air over a 40 square foot room at a cost of less than 1 cent per day.

This smartphone powered lampless lamp is the ideal bedside companion. Available in four different colors, this clap and motion activated dimmable lamp/charging station illuminates using your phone’s LED and even falls asleep with you after 30 minutes of no movement.

Increase your phone’s usability by turning it into a more powerful light source with this smartphone flashlight booster. It attaches magnetically to your phone’s LED and turns it into a tight-focused flashlight so you can see better and further in total darkness.

Give poker night a geeky touch your fellow coders will love by using these programming playing cards. Each card in the deck features a short entry featuring a distinct programming language like Java, C++, SQL, Python, and many more.

Become the envy of everyone at your yoga class by showing up with one of these intricate and vibrant yoga mats. They break away from the boring and uninspired designs by showcasing amazing and incredibly colorful patterns that reflect your creativity.

Safeguard your computer from online threats by taking control of your privacy using this SilentKeys incognito keyboard. This Plug’n’Play keyboard allows you to go anonymous inside your own secure space with the push of a button to protect your information.

This small form factor A4-SFX offers gamers the smallest case possible while still having space for high-end standardized components such as Core i7 processors and powerful full-length GPUs, such as the GeForce GTX 980 Ti.

Enjoy mouth-watering cuts of cheese while adhering to your strict dietary restrictions using this dairy-free vegan cheesemaking kit. Ideal for the lactose-intolerant, the kit includes everything you’ll need to whip up everything from mozzarella to feta.

Turn any surface into a remote control with Knocki – the smart device that gives you control of your favorite functions through the surfaces around you. Simply attach this compact device to any surface and it instantly turns it into a programmable touch interface.

Don’t just stop thieves – blow them up! Just kidding – but this exploding anti-theft bicycle alarm does produce sparks, smoke, and an extremely loud bang that’ll draw all eyes to the bicycle and deter the would-be thief from committing their heinous crime.

Say goodbye to ironing and wrinkles by placing your denim on the jean hanger. Unlike conventional hangers, this hanger’s conventional design holds up your jeans by their belt loop – allowing you to easily dry and hang your favorite pair.

Make your action figures take on a life of their own by placing them inside this mixed reality hologram device. This affordable device works with your smartphone so you can easily create amazing effects that blur the lines between the real and virtual world.

Get unrivaled hearing protection while simultaneously enjoying crisp music by wearing these Bluetooth earplug headphones. They feature soft silicone tips that make them great extended periods of use, along with an ergonomic design to ensure they won’t fall out.

Ensure your devices remain juiced up while you’re off the grid using this connected smartgrid flatpack lantern. It’s compact enough to fit in almost any pack and features a rechargeable internal battery that doubles as a portable powerbank.

Shoot farther and more accurate than ever before by using this trigger release slingshot. This modern take on an ancient weapon features a sturdy aluminum body and stainless steel trigger mechanism that allows you to launch your projectile in one fluid motion.

Help fan the flames of your children’s imagination by making their dreams a reality with this mini toy 3D printer. This kid-friendly 3D printer requires absolutely no assembly and features a simple three step process to print any toy, tool, or accessory they like.

Relieve the tension caused by hours of sitting and slouching by using this wearable massage hoodie. It’s designed with ultra-thin acupressure technology that analyzes and improves posture in real time using its six inflatable massage modules.

The FlyPro XEagle is a voice and smartwatch controlled crossover drone with traditional controllers for cinematography and auto-follow capabilities perfect for action sports – in addition to advanced features for flight, control, video, safety, and more.

The seats may be cramped, but you can still travel in total comfort by wearing this pretzel travel pillow. The design provides ample padding around your neck to keep your head from bobbing around, while also keeping your arms supported by your sides.

Make delicious, fresh, homemade tortillas at the touch of a button by using this artisan tortilla maker. This handy device is small enough to fit on any counter and rapidly transforms a recyclable pod of fresh dough into a hot and delicious tortilla.

Get true audiophile quality in your home without spending the big bucks by purchasing these wireless transparent speakers. Apart from its visually striking appearance, it uses DECT technology – which changes how sound is delivered to your ears.

Create beautifully intricate works of art in no time at all with help from this drawing machine. This carefully crafted machine’s build is small enough to transport and comes with 16 gears – making it capable of creating countless unique designs.

Now you can experience the joys of creating beautiful music without knowing how to actually play a guitar. The MI guitar replaces the traditional fret board so that anyone can play their favorite songs or create their very own music without having any musical training.

Give your workstation an added dose of elegance with this eye-catching oligodynamic copper sphere. Available in either a matte or polished finish, it’s machine crafted to perfection and naturally kills germs on contact.

Put an end to shoe blisters once and for all by applying this revolutionary PreHeels spray to directly to your feet. After the spray dries, it forms a strong polymetric bond designed to create an invisible anti-friction barrier between your shoes and feet.

Keep your cash, credit cards, and ID secure when you’re out and about by storing them in this locking code wallet. It’s secure, compact and comes with a built-in customizable 3 digit lock system that must be set to the right combination to open the wallet.

Transform your standard bicycle into an electric model in just 60 seconds by installing the GeoOrbital electric bicycle wheel. With its universal compatibility, your bike will be capable of traveling at speeds of up to 20 miles per hour for distances up to 50 miles.

Add a touch of industrial appeal to your work space by keeping everything tidy inside this desktop organizing shipping container. The container displays an incredibly realistic outward appearance and is large enough to store everything from pens to paperclips.

There’s no better way to silence your critics’s legitimate concerns and complaints than by playing the woman card. The deck features features 12 original, hand-drawn portraits of heavily accomplished American women… and Hillary “I’ll Look Into It” Clinton.

This minimal EDC roll-up water bottle’s inventive design allows you to take it virtually anywhere without creating a bulk. Apart from the roll-up design, the water bottle comes with a handy paracord handle along with a compact flint and fire starter tool.

Effortlessly improve your posture by strapping on this smart posture support. The device helps you change your postural habits by supporting your shoulders, aligning your spine, and sending a notification to your smartphone when you begin to slouch.

Make your stuff stick onto nearly any surface around you using this reusable sticky gel pad. This small oval shaped pad features a double sided super sticky surface that you can easily adhere and remove for maximum convenience.

Put your brain to the ultimate test as you try to outsmart your opponent in the Tak abstract strategy game. Simple in its rules, yet complex in its strategy -players must take turns trying to build a connected string of game pieces.

Make your directional intentions on the road visible to those around you with help from these blinker/brake light motorcycle shoes. They connect wirelessly to your bike and act as an extension to your brake and blinker lights.

Improve the air quality in your home without needing overpriced fancy equipment using this ingenious natural air purifier. It redirects the air in your home through the roots of the plant so that it detoxifies before you breathe it back in.

With the world’s smartest bed, you’ll never have a bad night’s sleep ever again! The bed is designed to monitor your body’s vital stats in real-time and allows you to adjust everything from firmness to temperature control using your smartphone.

Securely and conveniently transport just about anything by placing it on this transformable hand cart. This versatile cart can be set to one of nine different variations such as a baggage cart, hand truck, dolly, and a wagon.

Whether you’re looking to embark on a lightweight fishing trip or just want to engage in a violent bumper boat battle, this personal portable watercraft is up for the job! It weighs just 15lbs and is small enough to fit in the trunk of your car when disassembled.

Is it possible for one bag to replace your entire collection? This versatile convertible leather bag by Asum can be arranged in a variety of ways so you can use it like a purse, backpack, tote, crossbody, and even a clutch.

Defy the laws of physics by setting this gyroscope spintop in motion! It sports a sleek aircraft grade aluminum design and comes with a kevlar string that you run through the “generator” to create an incredibly fast spin.

Add amazing effects to your photos when you get your creative hands on this trioplan F2.9/50 camera lens. This specialized lens creates a soap bubble bokeh effect, providing ground breaking front focus while adding an artistic flair to the background.

Alleviate the strain on your eyes caused by looking at screens all day long by using this water propelled eye massager. It’s designed to circulate either cold or warm water around your eyes to regulate and improve blood circulation, as well as reduce swelling.

Make your favorite time of the month a more bearable experience by eliminating menstrual pain using this ingenious device. It uses electric pulses to stimulate your nerves and completely block pain signals from passing to the brain – so you’ll instantly feel better.

Make long trips a little more bearable by increasing your comfort level using this innovative frontal travel pillow. The ergonomic design allows you to position the pillow in a number of ways so you can find the position that best suits you.

Explore every inch of our majestic moon’s surface without leaving our Earth using this topographically accurate lunar globe. A ring of LEDs shine over this 1:20-million scale globe’s surface to mimic natural sunlight and correctly recreate the moon’s phases.

Turn your sweet rock star moves into beautiful music using nothing more than this wearable air guitar. You simply snap on the device like a regular wristwatch, connect to the app, choose your sound, and begin creating amazing music with your movements.

Avoid freezing your butt off next time you’re camping by slipping into one of these wearable heated sleeping bag liners. Able to go 12 hours on a single charge, this water resistant liner covers you from head to toe and increases your sleeping bag’s rating by 20 degrees.

Don’t let bulky sweaters get in the way of your PDA  – stay closer and warmer than ever before by slipping into these hugging hoodies. Each hoodie sports a pair of pockets located over the back that are designed to keep your hands warm as you hold your sweetie close.

Effortlessly keep your beverage at the perfect drinking temperature by pouring it into this sleek smart mug. It links to your smartphone via Bluetooth so you can easily control the temp and features a built-in 10k mAh battery that can be used to charge devices.

The ultimate titanium EDC belt combines style and practicality into an incredibly durable accessory ideal for everyday use. It sports a quality nylon strap available in various hues and is complemented by a curved titanium buckle.

Set yourself apart from the pack by trading in your standard timepiece for this Soloscope automatic watch. One half of the watch’s face features a unique one-hand design that encircles the hour and points to the minute while the other half displays its inner workings.

Get the stats you need to improve your riding experience in an easy to read manner using this bike analog GPS speedometer. It displays speed, distance, time, and altitude – and has a battery life of up to 24 hours so you can ride till your legs fall off.

Give your photos a bit of old world charm by equipping your camera with this lomography 2.9/64 lens. This handcrafted lens is modeled after the vintage lens from the 1830s and allows you to alternate between either razor-sharp or soft focused effects.

Easily improve the air quality in your home or office with this air purifying desktop greenhouse. Small enough to fit on any desktop, it circulates up to 450 cubic feet of purified air every hour and provides the ideal environment for lush plant life to flourish.

Get the extremely close shave you desire without causing any irritation by using this Model T razor. It works with standard stainless steel razors and comes with an intuitive, easy loading mechanism that lets you customize the angle at which the blade slices.

Stave off boredom without needing a WiFi connection by gathering you and a few friends around this 33-in-1 interchangeable cornhole board. In addition to the classic bean bag game, you can switch out the board to play dozens of other equally fun games.

Increase your productivity by optimizing your work space using these magnetic tablet mounts for PCs. Compatible with tablets ranging from 7.9″ to 12.9″, the mount allows you to easily increase your display surface, so you can work more efficiently.

The ultimate convertible bag is the versatile pack that adapts to fit any occasion. The ingenious design allows you to instantly shift its form/structure, so you can use it in a variety of styles like as a messenger bag, a backpack, and a handy briefcase.

It’s about time you start traveling smart. The Floatti suitcase is loaded with features like a built-in digital scale, a suspension ride, touch controls, tracking systems, laptop and phone chargers, and an assortment of organized packing compartments.

Bring the exquisite taste of craft beer to your home with this easy to use automated craft beer home brewery. You simply choose your favorite recipe from the vast online library, press the start button, and wait one week to sample the best beer you’ve ever had.

titleEN: The Ultimate BBQ Grill Cleaning Brush
content: Improve your grilling experience and the overall taste of your food by keeping your BBQ clean using this ultimate BBQ grill cleaning brush. It features a combination of differently angled bristles to clean every nook and cranny imaginable.

While traditional bulky towels take forever to dry, this antibacterial microfiber beach towel is super thin and dries 3 times quicker. Along with its ultra compact roll up design, it’s also treated with silver antimicrobial ions to prevent bad odors and bacteria from growing.

Have you ever wondered what it’s like to try on a cloud? If so, then you need a pair of these Mulberry silk lined pants. Available in styles ranging from jeans to chinos, they come lined with smooth Mulberry silk from the top of the waist to the bottom cuff.

Conveniently set up a workstation at any job site by bringing along this ergonomic folding all-in-one desk. It sports a sturdy aluminum construction that sets up in seconds to provide an ample work area and folds flat for easy transport.

Bring in some lovely ambient lighting using this egg shaped wireless lamp. It charges conveniently on a wireless pad, will last for up to seven hours of continuous use, and is compact enough to easily take anywhere with you.

Enjoy a crisp and audible phone conversation even in the noisiest of environments by using these noise blocking earbuds. These Bluetooth enabled wireless earbuds feature an in-ear microphone so you always have a crystal clear conversation.

Transform yourself into a modern day warrior by slipping into one of these samurai armor hoodies. The design incorporates aspects of traditional Japanese armor into a fashionable garment that’s both comfy to wear and great at fighting off the cold.

Instantly turn the dead of night into day using this ultra powerful wearable flashlight. This lightweight flashlight comfortably wraps around your hips and features a pair of powerful lights that produce an impressive 7,911 lumens.

Plastic 3D printers lose their charm very quickly – they are fragile, prone to clogging, and have limitations on how fast they can print. Now with the Trinus you can get yourself an all-metal 3D printer without breaking the bank.

Get one step closer to becoming a real life Iron Man with one of these Badjo exoskeleton suits. In addition to standard components like full temperature control, you can customize the suit with everything from Spiderman-like webbing to flame throwers.

Conquer any terrain mother nature throws your way by riding on this convertible all-road bike. The intelligent design allows you to alter the bike’s geometry in order to better suit the type of ride you have planned and get the ultimate performance.

Now you can automatically adjust your blinds based on sunlight, temperature, or a preset schedule using this solar powered blind adjuster. It installs in three easy steps and is designed to work on both horizontal and vertical blinds.

Minimize your chances of getting a ticket while driving by outfitting your ride with this legal wireless speed trap indicator. It fits discreetly on your dashboard and warns you of impending speed traps, red light cameras, and school zones by flashing in different hues.

Explore the world of genetics by performing your own DNA tests using this portable laboratory. A centrifuge extracts the DNA while a thermocycler targets a specific piece of it and then makes millions of copies that are visualized by an illuminated gel unit.

Improve your auditory experience by listening to your tunes through these 3D audio headphones. The headphones instantly calibrate to your anatomy, increasing the sense of auditory space, and acoustically recreating the way you hear the world.
